The Go Devroom at FOSDEM 2017

02 Feb 2017

For the third time at this year’s FOSDEM (which stands for “Free and Open Source Software Developers’ European Meeting” according to Wikipedia) features a room on Sunday (5 February 2017) dedicated to Go development: The Go Devroom. fd0 will be available for a chat about restic and Go development the whole day!
